actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-963.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 631) making further continuing appropriations and providing for productive employment for the fiscal year 1983, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 631 (Continuing appropriations and employment).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 631) making further continuing appropriations and providing for productive employment for the fiscal year 1983, and for other purposes.
